data:
Sergio  Fabi Assistant Professor, NTRC 210 Gallalee Hall (205) 348-8834 sfabi@ua.edu Monday, 3-4pm; Wednesday, 3-4pm Ph.D. University of Alabama 2008 Dr. Fabi’s research consists of theoretical physics: gravity, gauge theories and non commutative geometry. Mathematical physics: Lie groupoid .   Sergio Fabi Contact info  TEACHING PH101 PH102 PH105 PH106 PH331 - Electromagnetism PH354 - Intermediate Modern Physics PH482 - Relativity RESEARCH An Invitation to Synthetic Differential Geometry (2019) - Introduction On the gauge features of gravity on a Lie algebroid structure  (2013) On the equation of motion for test particles in an ambient
gravitational field as the Wong equation for a generalized gauge theory (2011) __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ "The
